BR_text.BRsummary: IntTensor methods sin(), cos() are broken
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ChatSam>@ChatSam</denchmark-link>
  commented on <denchmark-link:https://github.com/OpenMined/OpenMined/issues/409>Wed Jan 31 2018</denchmark-link>
 
 The IntTensor methods which return objects of type FloatTensor which are sin() and cos() are broken.
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6478266/35606314-656cb044-061c-11e8-918a-3d7ea7345cb2.png></denchmark-link>
